title: Which makes more money, copywriting or freelancing? - Quora

response.answer_text: You’ve probably heard numerous times that copywriting may be a good way to earn money as you travel the planet and now you would like to understand the way to become a copywriter too. You can easily make money working as a contract copywriter not just from home but anywhere within the world. Better still, you don’t need much to urge started. Copywriting may be a multimillion-dollar industry with skilled copywriters in continuous high demand. More and more businesses are understanding the importance of working with a talented copywriter for his or her marketing efforts. You don’t need a degree but you are doing got to be good at writing. So if this is often something you'll see yourself doing, keep it up reading for advice on the way to be a copywriter.

Definitely a freelancer due to the smaller amount of commissions and intermediaries and generally greater opportunities. Copywriting is rather loose work on some platforms, and a freelancer can still do the same but running his own business.
